A thousand years in the future, a group of "children" are taught logic and psychology through a very special exercise.

A black figure materializes into a four-sided white room with no windows or distinguishable features. With the wave of a hand, 12 chairs in a circle materialize in the middle of the room. The black figure instantly changes into an elderly man, the visage of a wizened teacher, complete with liver spots, wrinkles, and scholarly harry potter-esq spectactles.

Without any delay, students start blinking into the chairs without any order. Within the span of several seconds, all the chairs are filled with students from all over the globe, represented by all races and genders. A motley crew of youngsters, some of them start laughing and playing amongst themselves, while others just sit perfectly still, completely uninterested in the prospect of social interaction.

"Class, today I have something very special for you." - the avatar of the old teacher said. Whether their teacher actually looked like that or if it was just an idol designed to create an impression of wisdom, they didnt know. They respected him regardless, as this particular Teacher-Intelligence was over 200 years old.

"Roughly a thousand years ago, in the Age of Upheaval, about 30 years before the first singularity burst - there existed a game people used to play. People dont play it anymore as we have constructs that are about a million times more sophisticated, but nonetheless today you will learn about the people of mafiascum.net"

Several of the students sighed, while others accessed any data they could on the subject instantly. One of the latter spoke up.

"There is very little data available about that site, TI-Tiemaetre"

"Ha! That is because most data from that time is lost forever. But I have trawled enough information from various cached sources that will allow me to teach you what it was about."

Suddenly, in a millisecond, each of the students were granted the knowledge and rules of the game of mafia as played on mafiascum.net a thousand years ago by way of a TI.exe program sent directly into their memory. The teacher smiled. The students started chattering amongst themselves, as personal messaging was not allowed in the presence of a TI. Even some of the more stoic students seemed interested.

Game Play, Etiquette, Basics

Spoiler:
1a. Participation in this game is a commitment and a responsibility. Please take it seriously and be considerate to others. If you plan to be gone longer than 48 hours, please post a bolded notice in the thread.

2a. Everyone deserves respect. Personal attacks will not be tolerated. These include disparaging comments on race, religion, age, gender, orientation, or similar characteristics. I will only moderate politeness in the thread for extreme situations, but keep in mind it’s just a game and act accordingly.

3a. This is a closed game. Roles may not be quoted in any form. No mod PM may be quoted in any form. Very small, invisible or encrypted text is not allowed.

4a. No forms of cryptography. This includes using ciphers, encrypted text, etc. You aren't a spy in WWII, you're a dude playing some mafia.

5a. No "Trust Tells" - Trust Tells are specific tells that absolutely verify a fact beyond the reasonable doubt associated with mafia games. Common examples of Trust Tells are Red Text of Truth and Pooky Promise. However, a couple of other Trust Tells exist specific to the person using them. All Trust Tells can be broken, but only for specific people and are almost universally always correct. The only time a Trust Tell is broken is when people sacrifice the ability to use the infinitely usually confirming themselves as town to win a single game as Mafia or a Third Party. For more information visit: viewtopic.php?f=5&t=21548

6a. No voice/video posts - you cannot make real-life recordings of yourself and link/post them in the game in any way.

7a. Players will receive acknowledgement that night actions are received.

8a. Players should not discuss the game in any way outside the thread unless the mod specifically allows it, and then only in the quicktopic linked in the message, which will be publicly linked after the game.

9a. This game will start with a Day phase; Nights are 72 hours long, during which the thread will be locked. Any actions not submitted will be missed; any player or faction with an ability may choose not to perform it.

10a. Players should aim for one post every 24 hours, minimum, to keep the game moving. I am a stickler for activity and not shy about prodding.

11a. Days have three week deadlines. Extensions are given only in extreme circumstances.

12a. I will be using NAR.


Voting, Deadlines and Death

Spoiler:
1b. More than half of all living players must vote on one victim for a Lynch to occur.

2b. Votes should be bolded and unambiguous or I might miss them. e.g Vote: Empking or use the
Code: Select all
[vote][/vote]
tags. VOTE: Faraday Same goes for unvoting. Its not required but it makes my life easier. UNVOTE: Faraday

3b. You may VOTE: Vote: No Lynch - a majority of these vote types will end the day without a lynch.

4b. If a simple majority is not reached at the deadline the result will be determined by the largest number of votes. If there is a tie, or the game in a lynch-or-lose situation, the result will be counted as a No Lynch.

5b. Once players have reached a majority no further voting will be counted for that day. After this point and before the end of the day – “twilight” – discussion may continue, including the victim. After that, I will add the player’s faction and their role.

6b. Dead players may not post within the game thread.

7b. Town wins when all other factions are dead.


Mechanics

Spoiler:
1c. No invisible or small text is allowed.

2c. I will try to post vote counts on a regular basis. A count will be posted sooner if requested, but don’t abuse the privilege.

3c. The mod does not lie. He does, however, periodically leave players to struggle with interpretation or flounder under assumptions.

4c. If you have an issue or questions about the game, please message me privately. The game thread is not a forum forum for mod interaction.

5c. I may make mistakes, and I appreciate being politely notified. Mistakes will be corrected where possible, but sometimes mistakes are made that cannot be reversed. These will stand as final to be commiserated over after the game.

6c. Inactive players will be prodded after two days without posting. A player who has been prodded three times may be replaced without further notice. If I fail to notice an inactive player, please notify me. I have little tolerance for lurkers - you have been warned.

7c. Rules violations will be dealt with according to their severity, up to and including a Modkill. Modkills will not take the place of any normal game mechanics.

8c. Any situation not explicitly covered above is subject to moderator discretion and will be handled as I see fit on a case-by-case basis.


"Well there you have it. We will play this game the way they used to play it. It will be of a Normal flavor. I am sending you your roles now. Here is an example Vanilla Townie role."

Code: Select all
Vanilla Townie
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Vanilla_townie

You possess no special mechanics. You can only vote during the day. This is your only tool against the mafia.

You win when all the threats to the town are eliminated.


"I will send you your roles now. Lets have some fun, children!"

With that, the children sat still, their faces frozen in time. In a space that could not be seen by an outside observer, the children started playing the game of mafia as played by the people of mafiascum.net, so many years ago.

The game had begun.

It is now pregame.

Please confirm via PM. Once 9 out of 12 players have confirmed, the day will start.

12 players have confirmed so far.
It is now Day 1.

FIRST!

Hey doods!

The gory white walls that were once filled with terrorized children instantly transformed into a green field filled with talking blue penguins. A serene breeze ruled the wind. Happy-sounding techno music was in the air, but it was hard to distinguish where it was coming from.

The eight children that remained were utterly baffled. Their clothes were clean and what just happened seemed like a distant if not terrible memory. A penguin walked up to them.

"Sorry doods. That setting was a bit grim. I know you've all seen and done worse for entertainment in the Cloud, but I'm old fashioned and it just wasn't my style. Anyway. We shall continue the game as we were playing it, only without the dark theatrics. Whats that? A no-lynch? Okay!"

A blue penguin walked up and tapped one of the players on the shoulder, a young asian boy.

"Sorry dood, its time to go"

He snapped his fingers compulsively and vanished.

Under a cerulean sky, the remaining children sat down in a circle and began talking.

A lynch has occured. Mod scene below.

The jungle was alive with raucous noise. Though nobody seemed to mind or question why they were there, it was just another backdrop, another part of the spectacle the teacher set up for them to make things more interesting. Simulated environments were par for the course; something as abstract as playing mafia in an alien jungle wasn't too much of a stretch for the children as the game of mafia itself. The people who played it on mafiascum.net were just as alien if not more so than the jungle.

"Of course Timeater couldn't have known all those years ago that we might replay his game in such a manner. Or, in the manner we are playing it now. He couldn't guess exactly what I'd say or exactly what you'd say. He was trying to break the 4th wall. Maybe he was fond of theatrical realism. He could only guess at our motivations and implementations. He wrote this as a message to us -"

The golem-teacher made a square outline within the air and a 2-dimensional representation of a cached version of mafiascum.net materialized.

"Hey guys. Timeater here. Yes, this is the mod Timeater aka Arnold talking right now. This is not part of the flavor. So what I've written upto this point is only a guidepost, a shot in the dark. You are taking part in an experiment. A silly experiment by a silly dreamer. Hey future people, sup homies. I DOUBLE DOG DARE YOU to play this out as I have written it. Now if that didn't get your attention, I dont know what will. WOO. Oh and PS - revive my dead ass with nanotech thanks."

One of the children scratched his gingery head.

"So you're doing this as a favor, a kindness for this Timeater person? But why?

"Who knows. Why are you getting lynched right now? I dont know. Its a mystery. Send me your night actions and get back to the game. After all, we're doing this in his honor."

{Oman, Mafia Goon, has been lynched.}

Day breaks this time on Tuesday (7th).

Instead of the usual suspension of active communication programs the handful of remaining students talked amongst themselves cordially. They chatted and smiled, proud that they were able to lynch the mafia so elegantly and calmy. However, one had his lips sealed. When he started to speak, the other students were startled so they listened politely.

"This feeling of hopelessness, this feeling of defeat. Its crushing. There is no way I can somehow orchestrate two mislynches in a row without a nightkill of my own. Its utterly hopeless. How AGar felt, its awful. This feeling is awful. I dont want to play anymore. You win! I give up! I surrender! You win, town!

He sighed as he vanished from the simulation.

The teacher started to clap slowly.

AGar, Traitor (Mafia), has been sympathetically modkilled for not playing to his win condition (during the night he informed me no longer wished to play e.g surrender. After consulting with Vi we came to the agreement that this was an acceptable course of action. Better than him claiming scum in thread!)

The Town: BBMolla, Oversoul, Hez, Elmo, kdub, Ant, Mykonian, Nisani, and Arugula, win! Woo!


The forest vanished. They were back in the white room. Everyone was present.

"So class, what did we learn? Oh nevermind we'll talk about that later. In the meantime, I want you to meet some people..."

Hez was the first to materialize in the room. He bowed. Then Oman. Then Ant. Then Peabody. Then Oversoul, holding a glass of milk. Etc. Soon everyone was smiling and shaking the hands of the child that was playing them, asking them questions about the game, laughing, and just having a good time. Timeater was the last to materialize.

Yes, they were just programmed facsimiles, super-advanced personality constructs, but hell - they didn't care. They were programmed not to.

"I've said it once and I'll say it again, its nice to finally see you again after a thousand years."

The game is over!

Mod Thoughts:
(opinions ahoy)

Spoiler:
Balance/Setup: So the game was balanced around the Mafia Joat role, which is obviously somewhat unusual and rather strong. To compensate a little for that we have a mafia traitor/spy (not recruitable) and a regular goon. Since I'm a quirky guy I wanted to spice up the normal neighborizer role a bit and make it compulsive. And deputy+cop was more preferable to doctor+cop. This game was rigorously balanced by Llamafluff mainly over multiple months. He's a slave driver.

Big Play Shoutouts: Nisani for not getting lynched, and holding on to that cop role for dear life. Hez, Kdub, and Oversoul for really pulling together in lylo. AGar, for playing a masterful traitor.

What I learned: No redundant role names (backup cop > deputy)! Try to write all your flavor BEFORE the game. Find a specific style of votecounting and stick with it. Make your OWN rules (I was really lazy basically just copy/pasted someone's rules. They were reviewed too.). Follow your own rules TO THE LETTER (answering questions in thread).

Thanks: Mostly Vi, for being my support-mod and helping me when I had mod-related questions. The players who DIDNT replace out. The players who replaced in and stayed in. And any future-people who might play along =D

Compulsive Neighborizer
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Neighborizer
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Compulsive

Every night you must (its not optional) recruit someone into your neighborhood. The "neigborhood" is a space where you can speak with people you've recruited outside the thread. You may speak during there during the day only. (quicktopic link here) It should be noted that you gain no information about the alignment or role of people you neighborize.

You win when all the threats to the town are eliminated.

Cop
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Cop

Every night you can investiate someone. By doing this, you will learn if they are innocent or guilty. You are not insane and have no hidden modifiers.

You win when all the threats to the town are eliminated.

Deputy
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Deputy

While right now you currently do not have any special abilities, if a cop dies, you will take over their role, but not gain any of their past results. So for the moment, you only have your vote and your wits.

You win when all the threats to the town are eliminated.

Vanilla Townie
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Vanilla_townie

You possess no special mechanics. You can only vote during the day. This is your only tool against the mafia.

You win when all the threats to the town are eliminated.

Mafia Joat
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Joat

You are a Mafia Jack of All Trades. You have three one-shot abilities you can use during the night. These are:

* One-shot rolecop. (find out what role someone is)
* One-shot roleblock. (block somebody's night action for the night)
* One-shot track. (target a player to find out who they targeted during the night)

In addition to your abilities, you have a Factional Nightkill you can use each night. I need to know who you wish to kill and which of you is doing the kill.) Also, You cannot both use the Nightkill and one of your abilities the same night. Its one or the other. You can talk to your buddy here during the night (qt link)

You win when the mafia outnumbers the town/kills them all, your partner is X, who is a Mafia Goon.

Mafia Goon
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Goon

You are a Mafia Goon. You have no special abilities.

You have a Factional Nightkill you can use each night. (I need to know who you wish to kill and which of you is doing the kill.) You can talk to your buddy here during the night (qt link)

You win when the mafia outnumbers the town/kills them all, your partner is X, who is a Mafia Jack of all Trades.

Mafia Traitor
https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Traitor

You are a Mafia Traitor. You are a special case. You know who the mafia are: X and X. However, they do not know about you. They believe they are the only two mafia. You are on their team. You cannot be killed by the Factional Kill they possess and you cannot use the Factional Kill. You are also immune to investigations and will always turn up innocent.

You win when the mafia outnumbers the town/kills them all, your partners are X and X though you may not speak with them during the night or in any space outside the thread.
